name: Five Nightmare Nights 2
description:
CHAPTER ONE: after tommy varivant finished his work in (fazbear restaurant) in 1999 he reopened (red restaurant) with some changes only opened two animatronics which were rednight - springtrap (william afton) and rednight had a change of eyes for not to be so terrifying but one day rednight and william were entertaining some children when rednight began to have permanent failures and I attack one of the children william surprised I deactivate it before someone else gets hurt but unfortunately william began to have hallucinations in which I saw to rednight acting in the same way as he saw her so he wants to destroy her because of the murder that they had asked for help for someone to work for 5 nights which a person who was friend of tommy varivant named james frods accepted the job

CHAPTER TWO: when james received the check he decided to work one more night which after having finished it the employees told him that he was not allowed to work a weekend but even so they gave him some exotic butters even if james finished his work he started to have hallucinations as william had them only that you see his hallucinations were a blue bear with lost eyes called (bluenight)

press F5 to save the game and F6 to load the game
